# Why SSH Keys?

Secure authentication without passwords.

# Create Key

```bash
ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -C "yourname@osu.edu" -f ~/.ssh/buckai_key
```

# Permissions

```bash
chmod 700 ~/.ssh
chmod 600 ~/.ssh/buckai_key
chmod 644 ~/.ssh/buckai_key.pub
```
